tool_description: This API provides all the latest news happening in Kerala fetched from different authentic News Sources
name: Kerala News
title: Kerala News

api_list.name: Get News by Channel
api_list.description: Get Latest Kerala News From Specific News Channel
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://kerala-news.p.rapidapi.com/news/24News"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "kerala-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://kerala-news.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "kerala-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
